name: Veo 3.1 Video Extender Kie Ai
description:
Extends an existing Veo3.1 video generated through the Kie.ai API, by creating a new 8 seconds video based on the original video and a text prompt.
Pricing (as of November 2025): $0.30 per 8s video extension.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

watermark.description: Optional text to overlay as watermark on video

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created video (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

seed.description: Optional integer between 10000 and 99999 for reproducible generations

prompt.description: Required text prompt describing the desired video extension content, max 5000 characters

task_id.description: Required task ID from original Veo3.1 video generation task through kie.ai

local_path.description: Path to the downloaded video file in home directory

video_urls.description: List of URLs to the generated extended videos
